Container.Name: citron-room-server
Container.Overview: Citron Room Server - Dedicated multiplayer server for Citron Nintendo Switch Emulator with 17 bug fixes. Features per-session logging with human-readable timestamps, automatic log cleanup, PUID/PGID support, and supports up to 254 concurrent players with ban list persistence and public room announcements.

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Persistent storage for ban lists and session logs. Each container restart creates a new timestamped log file.

Config.Name: Room Name
Config.Description: The name of your multiplayer room (shown in lobby)

Config.Name: Room Description
Config.Description: Description shown to players in lobby

Config.Name: Preferred Game
Config.Description: Preferred game name shown in lobby

Config.Name: Preferred Game ID
Config.Description: Preferred game ID in hex (e.g., 01006A800016E000 for Smash Bros). Set to 0 for any game.

Config.Name: Password
Config.Description: Room password (leave empty for no password)

Config.Name: Lobby Username
Config.Description: Your Citron username (required for public rooms)

Config.Name: Lobby Token
Config.Description: Your Citron token (required for public rooms). Get from Citron account settings.

Config.Name: Web API URL
Config.Description: Citron API URL for public rooms (e.g., https://api.ynet-fun.xyz)

Config.Name: Enable Citron Mods
Config.Description: Allow Citron community moderators to moderate your room (true/false)

Config.Name: Max Log Files
Config.Description: Number of session log files to keep. Each container restart creates a new log. Older logs are automatically deleted.

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Server port (must match exposed ports above)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users on Unraid)
